resources.string: Applications can use camera hardware features.
Take photos, videos, and scan images.
Applications can use location hardware functionality.
The application can read files on the device, such as images and videos.
Used for social attributes and application creation.
The application can monitor the input of the microphone
The application can install other applications into the current device system.
Applications can use the Internet to communicate with external devices.
Remind users with the notification function of the system.
Partial functions improve user convenience through notifications.
The battery strategy provided by the system.
Modify battery strategy to receive messages in a timely manner.
Please grant permission in the System Application Settings
